name: contribute
attributes: # [doc = " 支援者がキャンペーンに資金を提供するが、"]
# [doc = " campaign_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合検証がない"]
body: let campaign = & mut ctx . accounts . campaign_account ;
transfer_lamports (& user . to_account_info () , & ctx . accounts . pool , amount) ? ;

name: withdraw
attributes: # [doc = " キャンペーンオーナーが資金を引き出すが、"]
# [doc = " campaign_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合検証がない"]
body: let campaign = & mut ctx . accounts . campaign_account ;
transfer_lamports (& ctx . accounts . pool , & user . to_account_info () , amount) ? ;

name: record_contribution
attributes: # [doc = " キャンペーンへの支援を記録するヘルパー関数"]

name: record_withdrawal
attributes: # [doc = " キャンペーンからの引き出しを記録するヘルパー関数"]

name: transfer_lamports
attributes: # [doc = " 直接 Lamports を移動するヘルパー関数"]
body: * * from . lamports . borrow_mut () = from . lamports () . checked_sub (amount) . unwrap () ;
* * to . lamports . borrow_mut () = to . lamports () . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;

fields.name: campaign_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は `#[account(has_one = owner)]` を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: pool
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ラムポートを保管するキャンペーンプール"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 操作をリクエストするユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このキャンペーンを所有するべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: total_raised
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに集めた総支援額"]

fields.name: contribution_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 支援トランザクション数"]

fields.name: total_withdrawn
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに引き出した総額"]
